Help menu: Smart tracking is the way to know how many times you was in your applications phone during a last week. Today until six days ago: smart tracking menu is a buttons of the day that you want to choose, in this application part the user choose a specific information of the day. When the user click on some of day options his view have 2 things : name , time . 
Name: is the name of the application that you was in this specific day. 
Time: how long of time you was in this specific day.

Help Save : only if the user want to save some of day data he choose in this option.
